main event: A witness observed a circular, silver-colored object the size of a small automobile moving at a high speed and altitude near Westbury, New York.
interesting points: The object had a distinct outline and appeared to move with no apparent effort or power source.
The witness and their wife observed the object, which appeared suddenly and disappeared from view within seconds.
There were no flashing lights or sounds associated with the object.
The witness had seen similar objects in the area before but had never reported them.
The witness was unsure if the object posed a threat and wanted to know if others had seen similar objects.
